pageProduct.name: Systane Complete Lubricant Eye Drops 10ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

Are you putting up with irritated, tired, sore, watery, dry eyes?

You may be suffering from dry eyes! Systane® range of lubricating eye drops are designed to moisturise and relieve the symptoms of dry eyes. Systane® COMPLETE is the all-in-one eye drop that replenishes all layers of the tear film. Systane® COMPLETE relieves irritated, tired, sore, watery, dry eyes for up to 8 hours^. Systane® COMPLETE uses unique technology to moisturise, restore and stabilise the tear film:

- HP-Guar to allow retention of moisture and relieve dry eye symptoms

- Nano-sized lipid droplet technology to minimise blurring and provide surface coverage on your eyes

*IQVIA 01 TEARS S1K SELL-IN VALUE MAT 2021-02. ^Dry eye and associated symptoms due to aqueous deficient, evaporative and mixed dry eye. References: 1. Alcon Data on File, Study CDMGD0012401 (available on request). 2. TFOS DEWS II 2017. 3. Rangarajan et al. J Ocul Pharmacol Th. 2019; 35(1): 32-37 (Sponsored by Novartis) 4. Springs, C. Dev Ophthalmol. 2010;45:139-147

ALWAYS READ THE LABEL. FOLLOW THE DIRECTIONS FOR USE.

IF SYMPTOMS PERSIST, TALK TO YOUR HEALTH PROFESSIONAL

^Sodium hyaluronate, the salt form of hyaluronic acid.

Reference: 1. Rangarajan et al. J Ocul Pharmacol Th. 2019; 35(1): 32-37 (Sponsored by Novartis). 2. Gokul, A. et al. Cont Lens Anterior Eye 2018; 41: 97-100. 3. Rangarajan, R., et al. (2015) . J Ocul Pharmacol Ther. 31 (8). p.491-497.

Systane Complete Lubricant Eye Drops is a sterile emulsion containing Propylene Glycol, Hydroxypropyl Guar, Mineral Oil, Dimyristoyl Phosphatidylglycerol, Polyoxyl 40 Stearate, Sorbitan Tristearate, Boric Acid, Sorbitol, Edetate Disodium, Polyquad (Polyquaternium-1polidronium Chloride) 0.001% Preservative, and Purified Water. It may contain hydrochloric acid and/or sodium hydroxide to adjust pH. Do not use if allergic to any ingredient in this product.
